name: oxymor-st
title: Oxymor ST
desc: Customizable Tailwind CSS landing page template for showcasing products, apps, or services.
article: Oxymor ST is a professional SaaS landing page template designed to highlight your product, app, or service with a clean, modern layout. Available in both HTML and Astro versions, this template is equipped with eye-catching animations, such as smooth bento grid effects and a detailed navbar that elevates the user experience. The sky blue gradient backdrop creates an inviting and serene aesthetic, while subtle button shadows and polished UI elements ensure a high-quality look.
